item.title: Kidnapped Ledger Co-Founder David Balland Had His Hand Mutilated in Ransom Plot
item.description:
David Balland, the former co-founder of Ledger, was kidnapped with his wife in France, enduring a harrowing 48-hour ordeal. Injured during the incident, Balland was freed in a dramatic rescue involving over 90 officers. The case involved a crypto ransom and remains under investigation.
